ENTRY.refkeywords: model models modeling modelling parameter par parameters
ENTRY.SYNOPSIS: Return the method for storing model identifiers

DESC.PARA: The get_model_autoassign_func returns a function pointer for the method of storing model identifiers initialized by model definition into the current Python namespace. (This is an advanced function which the general Sherpa user will not need.)
Refer to the set_model_autoassign_func command for more information ("ahelp set_model_autoassign_func").
The command is called with a user-defined function pointer named "myassignfunc".

BUGS.PARA: See the bugs pages on the Sherpa website for an up-to-date listing of known bugs.
